name: Verify that field Deposit Percent is set to disabled as 100% and field Overide Deposit Percent is not visible

testSteps.description: Given underwriter selects 'Workers Compensation' from create quote tile
And field DepositPercent has only option as '100%'
Then field Deposit Percent should be disabled
And field Overide Deposit Percent should not be visible
